audioJson.name: Minidisc
audioJson.fact1: This format's data is read to a memory buffer to minimize skipping, a problem with Compact Discs
audioJson.fact2: This format was mostly popular in Japan, with little uptake in other countries
audioJson.fact3: This format, along with the Digital Compact Cassette (released the same year), was intended to be a replacement for the Compact Cassette
